alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Dodge; Fond Du Lac; Green Lake (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 6:10AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Fond du Lac, Green Lake, northeastern Columbia and northern Dodge Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 609 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Berlin to near Poynette. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fond Du Lac, Beaver Dam, Waupun, Ripon, Berlin, Mayville, North Fond Du Lac, Horicon, Juneau, Lomira, Pardeeville, Randolph, Fall River, Markesan, Theresa, Hustisford, Oakfield, Rosendale, Rio, and Green Lake. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 151 between mile markers 120 and 163, and between mile markers 165 and 169. Wisconsin Highway 26 between mile markers 52 and 53. Interstate 41 between mile markers 83 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Columbia; Dodge; Fond Du Lac; Green Lake
